name: TASK_MANAGER.EXE_
description:
WARNING:

We are currently facing some bugs in the WebGL version of the game, mainly because of our usage of video. We recommend that you download the Windows or Linux build to experience the complete visual experience of the game for maximum aesthetic enjoyment.  :P

BOOTING SEQUENCE STARTED...

You are the kernel of a server machine.

The system is under attack.

Your mission is to kill the processes which are being spawned to fill up your RAM.

CONTROLS:

Arrows  / WASD to move

Space / Left Mouse Button to shoot

ESC to quit

TEAM:

  • Nilton Calegari: Programming / Game Design
  • Matheus Ligabue: UI Design / Music and SFX

Proudly presented by Scroplus.
